title: F1 Fantasy: top picks & predictions for the 2025 Emilia Romagna GP
summary: It's time to make some big changes to your F1 Fantasy line-up at the 2025 Emilia Romagna GP. Here are our predictions; tips on drivers to avoid; which chips to play and further analysis

qa_pairs.question: Which team is historically known for strong performances at the Emilia Romagna GP?
What is the primary strategy teams often consider at the Emilia Romagna GP?
In F1 Fantasy, what is the purpose of playing chips?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: To maximize points for a specific race
